transportAdvice: Miami has a Metrorail, Metromover, and bus network, though public transit coverage of tourist areas like South Beach is limited and often requires transfers; taxis and ride-hailing vehicles are widely available. South Beach and Wynwood are walkable within their neighborhoods, but a car or hired vehicle is generally the most practical way to get around the broader city.
